column8:
and output exactly one word with no extra text or punctuation:
1) Joy: strong happiness or excitement about current circumstances
2) Sadness: disappointment or sorrow about a situation
3) Anger: hostility or rage toward someone or something
4) Fear: worry or anxiety about future threats
5) Surprise: reaction to unexpected or startling news
6) Disgust: revulsion or strong disapproval (e.g.
column10:
’ ‘awful’)
7) Trust: confidence or reliability in ongoing performance
8) Anticipation: eagerness or excitement for upcoming events
9) Content: mild satisfaction or calm acceptance
10) Frustration: feeling blocked or hindered from a goal

• If forward-looking language or plans are emphasized
